text: He oraduna oraduna tyanna sangatila ki kaya amhi tumacyasobata navhato? Te mhanatila, ho, hote jarura, parantu tumhi svatahla margabhrastateta thevale hote. Ani pratiksa karita rahile ani sanka - sansaya karita rahile ani tumhala tumacya (nirarthaka) iccha akanksanni dhokyataca thevale yetheparyanta ki allahaca adesa ye'una pohocala ani tumhala allahacya babatita dhoka denaryane dhokyataca thevale
